description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Customer Interaction History component in Oracle E-Business Suite 12.1.1, 12.1.2, 12.1.3, 12.2.3, 12.2.4, and 12.2.5 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality and integrity via vectors related to User GUI, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-0528, CVE-2016-0529, and CVE-2016-0530.
